title: Oracle Declines on Concerns About Fulfilling AI Cloud Demand
description: Oracle Corp. fell the most in almost nine months after giving its long-range financial outlook, suggesting investors anticipated a bigger boost from its investment in AI infrastructure.

title: Salesforceâ€™s Benioff Apologizes for Pro-Trump National Guard Comments
description: Salesforce Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Benioff apologized for calling on President Donald Trump to send the National Guard to San Francisco, after almost a week of public criticism from local allies and government officials for his statements.

title: AI Music Generator Suno in Funding Talks at $2 Billion Valuation
description: Suno Inc., a startup that generates music using artificial intelligence, is in talks to raise over $100 million at a valuation of more than $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, quadruple its previous valuation.
